testcase.name: initializationError

error.message: Classes annotated with @RunWith(Cucumber.class) must not define any Step Definition or Hook methods. Their sole purpose is to serve as an entry point for JUnit. Step Definitions and Hooks should be defined in their own classes. This allows them to be reused across features. Offending class: class CarSimulation.CarSimulation.US__0001_Car_Customization_Test
